properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 8:30PM EST until February 10 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6
inches.

* WHERE...In Vermont, Bennington and Western Windham Counties.
In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced
visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday
morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall amounts expected in
eastern Bennington County, western Windham County and northeast
Berkshire County. Snowfall rates of up to one inch per hour
possible Monday morning.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EST MONDAY
